actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the treatment of loans with below-market interest rates shall not apply to loans to foreign governments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that special rules relating to the treatment of loans with below-market interest rates shall not apply to loans made to foreign governments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the treatment of loans with below-market interest rates shall not apply to loans to foreign governments.
